body_text:
Why didn't Orihime use her powers to reject the creation of the Espada? I finished the Hueco Mundo arc, up to episode 190, and I have a question about Orihime:
If Orihime can reject all things, why didn't she reject Aizen's creation of the Espadas? She can just say "I reject" and then cast at the Espada. POOF, gone.
